mapper.select: SELECT work_group_record_id, wgr.date, work_group_name, work_group_type, time_range_type, start, end, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, wgr.work_group_id FROM work_group_record wgr JOIN distribution d ON wgr.work_group_id = d.work_group_id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY wgr.date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Work_group_record(date, work_group_name, work_group_type, time_range_type, start, end, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, work_group_id) VALUES (#{date}, #{workGroupName}, #{workGroupType}, #{timeRangeType}, #{start}, #{end}, #{mon}, #{tue}, #{wed}, #{thu}, #{fri}, #{sat}, #{sun}, #{workGroupId})
